Package com.gemalto.idp.mobile.otp.dsformatting

Interface InputPrimitive

All Superinterfaces:
Primitive
All Known Subinterfaces:
DecimalInputDialogPrimitive, GroupedInputDialogPrimitive, InputDialogPrimitive, NumericInputDialogPrimitive, SelectionInputDialogPrimitive
public interface InputPrimitive extends Primitive
An interface for all primitives which accept input, either user entered or selected.
